title: How can your TV be used to spy on you? - Quora

response.answer_text: The webcam or voice control interface is not sufficiently secured AND the network over which the signal process is accessible. The Internet of Things is difficult to secure, and compromising webcams (be they stand alone or embedded in a device is a mainstay for the cyber criminal. Here is a video interview and piece from CSB affiliate KIRO7 and their consumer reporter, Jesse Jones. KIRO7 Video
